memberdef.argsstring: (const lv_area_t *coords, const lv_area_t *mask, const void *src, const lv_style_t *style, lv_opa_t opa_scale)
memberdef.name: lv_img_draw_core

memberdef.argsstring: (const lv_area_t *coords, const lv_area_t *mask, const void *src, const lv_style_t *style, lv_opa_t opa_scale)
memberdef.name: lv_draw_img

detaileddescription.para:
Draw an image
coords
the coordinates of the image
mask
the image will be drawn only in this area
src
pointer to a lv_color_t array which contains the pixels of the image
style
style of the image
opa_scale
scale down all opacities by the factor

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_img_dsc_t *dsc, lv_coord_t x, lv_coord_t y, const lv_style_t *style)
memberdef.name: lv_img_buf_get_px_color

detaileddescription.para:
Get the color of an image's pixel
dsc
an image descriptor
x
x coordinate of the point to get
y
x coordinate of the point to get
style
style of the image. In case of LV_IMG_CF_ALPHA_1/2/4/8 style->image.color shows the color. Can be NULL but for ALPHA images black will be returned. In other cases it is not used.
color of the point

Get the alpha value of an image's pixel
dsc
pointer to an image descriptor
x
x coordinate of the point to set
y
x coordinate of the point to set
alpha value of the point

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_img_dsc_t *dsc, lv_coord_t x, lv_coord_t y, lv_color_t c)
memberdef.name: lv_img_buf_set_px_color

detaileddescription.para:
Set the color of a pixel of an image. The alpha channel won't be affected.
dsc
pointer to an image descriptor
x
x coordinate of the point to set
y
x coordinate of the point to set
c
color of the point

memberdef.argsstring: (lv_img_dsc_t *dsc, lv_coord_t x, lv_coord_t y, lv_opa_t opa)
memberdef.name: lv_img_buf_set_px_alpha

detaileddescription.para:
Set the alpha value of a pixel of an image. The color won't be affected
dsc
pointer to an image descriptor
x
x coordinate of the point to set
y
x coordinate of the point to set
opa
the desired opacity

Set the palette color of an indexed image. Valid only for LV_IMG_CF_INDEXED1/2/4/8
dsc
pointer to an image descriptor
id
the palette color to set:
for LV_IMG_CF_INDEXED1: 0..1
for LV_IMG_CF_INDEXED2: 0..3
for LV_IMG_CF_INDEXED4: 0..15
for LV_IMG_CF_INDEXED8: 0..255
c
the color to set

Get the pixel size of a color format in bits
cf
a color format (LV_IMG_CF_...)
the pixel size in bits

Check if a color format is chroma keyed or not
cf
a color format (LV_IMG_CF_...)
true: chroma keyed; false: not chroma keyed

Check if a color format has alpha channel or not
cf
a color format (LV_IMG_CF_...)
true: has alpha channel; false: doesn't have alpha channel

Get the type of an image source
src
pointer to an image source:
pointer to an 'lv_img_t' variable (image stored internally and compiled into the code)
a path to a file (e.g. "S:/folder/image.bin")
or a symbol (e.g. LV_SYMBOL_CLOSE)
type of the image source LV_IMG_SRC_VARIABLE/FILE/SYMBOL/UNKNOWN
